DataShape.description: Definition of an edge thing registered with a Microserver and its connection information
DataShape.name: EdgeThingEndpoint

FieldDefinition.description: Content type accepted by the endpoint
FieldDefinition.name: accept

FieldDefinition.description: Host that the edge thing is running on
FieldDefinition.name: host

FieldDefinition.description: How long the edge thing will remain registered at the Microserver
FieldDefinition.name: keepalive

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the edge thing registered with the Microserver
FieldDefinition.name: name

FieldDefinition.description: Path to the edge thing's API
FieldDefinition.name: path

FieldDefinition.description: Port that the edge thing is accessed at
FieldDefinition.name: port

FieldDefinition.description: Protocol used to communicate with the edge thing
FieldDefinition.name: proto
